translation: Therefore, at all times, remember Me only and fight. With your mind and intellect fixed on Me, you will undoubtedly come to Me alone.
commentary: 8.7 Tasmat therefore? in all in all? in times (in) times? Mam Me? remember remember? fight fight? f and? Mayarpitamanobuddhih with mind and intellect fixed (or absorbed) in Me? Me to Me? Eve alone? Will you (thou) shalt come to? Undoubtedly doubtless.Commentary The whole mental machinery should be dedicated to the Lord. You must work with the mind and intellect devoted to Him.Fight Perform your own Dharma?
